name: ai-radio
description: AI Radio - Your Intelligent Personal Radio Experience

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.android:build: cd frontend && npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist

author: AI Radio Team
